name: Pacbase: Avoid undocumented Programs
description: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Pacbase programs
output: This report lists all undocumented Pacbase Programs. `!xA!`It provides the following information: `!xA!`Program full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there is documentation in the code. This rule will ensure there are comments within the Pacbase programs.
